visual.name: BulletChartByxViz
visual.description: Bullet chart is a variation of a bar chart that was developed as a replacement for gauges and meters

dataRoles.name: tooltip
dataRoles.description: Assign additional fields to be shown in tooltip.

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

conditionalFormattingLegend.description: Show Conditional Formatting Rules in Legend, along with the standard Legend items. Helps select/deselect conditional formatting rules during runtime. At least one category must be assigned to Legend field to use this feature.

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

targetFieldNamePrimary.description: Name of the field for tracking progress toward the target

targetFieldNameSecondary.description: Name of the field for tracking progress toward the target

targetFieldPrimary.description: Display progress(%) made towards Target value in tooltip

targetFieldSecondary.description: Display progress(%) made towards Target value in tooltip

valueDecimalcomparison.description: Decimal places for target comparison value

fontColor.description: Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

innerPadding.description: Pad the Space Between Data points

maxLabelHeight.description: The maximum height of the axis labels as a % of plot area. The value can range between 15-50%.

maxLabelWidth.description: The maximum width of the axis label

maxLength.description: Maximum number of data series to be displayed without a scrollbar

xAxisReverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

xAxisShowNthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

xAxisposition.description: Select an x-axis position (bottom or top). When the 'chart orientation' property in 'chart options' is set to 'Horizontal', the x-axis toggles between left and right.

autoAxisMinMax.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the scaling manually

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Set the position of Y axis

yAxispositionIbcs.description: Set the position of Y axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order

bandOneColor.description: This will be the Bullet First Band

valueColor.description: This color will be applied to value.

comparisonBandTotal.description: Display comparison band total value in tooltip

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlHorizontalAlignment.description: Offset value for data label alignment

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlPlacement.description: Select the Data label placement for better readability

dlVerticalAlignment.description: Offset value for data label alignment

fontColor.description: Select the Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

targetdlPlacementHorizontal.description: Select the Data label placement for better readability

targetdlPlacementVertical.description: Select the Data label placement for better readability

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

enableDataLabelFormatting.description: Enable to format the Data Labels

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

valueDecimalcomparison.description: Decimal places for target comparison value

variance.description: To set the title for Variance

varianceDecimalPlaces.description: This will be applied to the values shown in datalabel

variancePercentage.description: To set the title for the Variance Percentage

varianceScalingDisplay.description: This will scale the value which is displayed in datalabel

endHorizontal.description: End value for the Horizontal band

endVertical.description: End value for the Vertical band

verticalReferenceValue.description: The value for the vertical reference line

enablertl.description: Choose to have the values on the legend displayed from right to left - useful for right-to-left languages such as Arabic

hposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend

vposition.description: Select the alignment for the legend

fontColor.description: Select the Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

panningKey.description: Select the key to hold to pan the chart when zoomed in

pinchType.description: Select if the Pinch and Zoom can be done by the X, Y or both Axes

isMigrated.description: Will indicate component is migrated to new build or not
